titleInfo.title: EFFECTIVE SCALAR THEORY OF THE ELECTROWEAK PHASE-TRANSITION

mods.abstract: This talk summarizes results obtained from simulating a three dimensional pure Order Parameter (OP) model of the Electroweak Phase Transition (EWPT). Its detailed presentation appears in [1].

bibliographicCitation.wels: Karsch, F.; Neuhaus, T.; PATKOS, A. (1995): EFFECTIVE SCALAR THEORY OF THE ELECTROWEAK PHASE-TRANSITION. In: Nucl. Phys. B, Proc. Suppl.. ELSEVIER SCIENCE BV. (42). S. 581-583.
